text.text: Stayed here for a night with a small child alongside during my transit to USA. Booked it for Raddison 's name and expected some standards. Made a booking thru booking.com and had requested early check in well in advance over call and in writing from the property  which I totally understand was subject to availability. The standard time was 3.00 pm. but instead they gave an exhausted me the room with amenities mentioned in booking, close to 4 pm and that too as if they were doing a favor. Not mentioning names here but some of the front desk staff were appallingly haughty. A select few did extend genuine help. There were two things I specifically noticed about this place: I asked for two room keys (even if one of them deactivated) so I can keep the lights on for my child in room, in case I needed to step out for a wee bit, but they wouldnt give it as if I were asking for a treasure. Asked me to  'come back later' for it. Then I specifically noticed a bias in which they were sweet to foreigners and would happily let them check out with just a key drop but made us stand for long, for check out because they were 'checking our rooms' despite handing them card details and reporting minibar usage upfront. Why do not these people understand that business they get through people is what pays their salary irrespectively and that they are not there to judge or discriminate but render services and equally so? Upon complaining, they did give me extended check out hours, a complimentary cab to airport and a promise to upgrade to suite next time but will there be a next time now? Does this payment undo our distasteful  experience? Raddison is not a one night stand hotel but a dignified name.They should stop giving preferential treatment to customers of their choice and render services they have promised. Or maybe, just stop overcommitting.The management needs to train employees better in handling customer needs and esp do something about their biased behaviour. Customer's satisfaction and loyalty are not bought by hand outs but warm welcome, a comfortable stay and a stress free check out. So, I'm thoroughly disappointed.

text.text:
The Hotel is conveniently located which is its major advantage and is its USP. Its just a few minutes away from Indira Gandhi International Airport.
The check-in process was smooth though initial delay was there but was well managed by the front office Staff. They were very courteous and helpful. During peak hours the check-in process is a bit longer than expected.
The hotel staff is professional, very responsive, and they ensure that every detail is taken care of by them.
The rooms are spacious, clean and comfortable. And it had all the basic amenities required.
The Cafe Pride and Oriental Spice restaurant are nice and spacious and serve delicious food. And offer  well spread and extensive buffet breakfast and dinner with numerous options to satisfy your taste buds. Though it gets a bit crowded during breakfast time and one must wait to get a table during the peak breakfast time.
The conference halls are spacious and are well equipped. However, the issue of mosquitoes is there in the conference hall though they did try to take care of the same by still this needs to be taken care of by the Hotel Management
The retail outlets of Aerocity are just round the corner of the exit of the Hotel and one can go there for shopping and also enjoy ambience and the food at the various outlets located in the vicinity.
Overall it was a pleasant stay at the Pride Plaza Hotel and might stay again.

text.text:
I recently stayed at Pride Plaza Hotel and overall, it was a pleasant experience. The check-in process was smooth and the staff were courteous and professional throughout my stay. The rooms were clean, well-maintained, and offered all the necessary amenities for a comfortable stay. Housekeeping was timely and responsive, and the ambience of the hotel gave a warm and welcoming feel.

The location of the hotel is also quite convenient, especially for business travelers, with easy access to nearby commercial hubs and the airport. The facilities like the gym and spa were well-kept, and the common areas, including the lobby, had a premium feel.

However, the one area that fell short of expectations was the food. The variety was limited, and the taste did not quite match the standard set by the rest of the hotel. Whether it was the breakfast buffet or the in-room dining options, the flavors lacked richness and authenticity. For a hotel of this standard, I had expected better culinary quality.

That said, I would still recommend Pride Plaza Hotel for its service, location, and hospitality. With some improvements in the food department, it could easily become a top choice for all kinds of travelers.

editorialSummary.text: Relaxed rooms & suites in an upscale hotel offering 2 restaurants, an outdoor pool & a spa.

text.text:
The reception experience was a mixed bag. When I checked in, the gentleman at the desk was polite and professional. However, I noticed other reception staff casually chit-chatting, cracking jokes, and laughing loudly — which didn’t exactly set the right tone for a five-star property.

The real disappointment came at checkout. I was in a hurry to leave for a meeting and went to settle my bill. The taller gentleman at the reception had an expression as if I were staying for free and he was paying from his own pocket. He bluntly told me, “We first need to get your room checked before you can check out.” While I understand this is standard hotel procedure, most good hotels handle it discreetly without telling the guest directly in such a curt manner. His demeanor lacked basic courtesy — no “thank you” or “hope you enjoyed your stay,” just a dismissive “You’re done, you can go.”

It’s a shame because the hotel itself is decent, though dated. Expect older-style furniture, carpets, and interiors. On the plus side, the location is quite good. Unfortunately, the poor attitude of certain front desk staff overshadowed the positives.

Verdict: Nice location, but customer service at the reception needs a serious upgrade. I won’t be returning.

text.text:
Hyatt Centric Janakpuri is considered a full-service hotel, located in the heart of West Delhi. It is positioned conveniently beside Janakpuri West Metro Station, and excellent connectivity is provided via the Blue and Magenta metro lines. The location is often regarded as ideal for both business and leisure travelers.

A modern design is featured by the hotel, and spacious rooms are offered. A well-maintained breakfast area is provided, and courteous service is generally delivered by the staff. The property's accessibility and the variety of local markets nearby are often appreciated by guests.

However, several issues have been reported. Cleanliness has been questioned frequently, and maintenance concerns have been raised—dusty curtains, malfunctioning air conditioning, and mold in bathrooms have been noted in many reviews. The building was previously operated as Piccadilly Hotel, and signs of aging have still been observed despite its rebranding under the Hyatt name.

Delays in check-in and room preparation have been experienced. Although the breakfast spread is praised and politeness is shown by the staff, disappointment has been expressed by many regarding overall service quality. As a result, expectations typically associated with the Hyatt brand have not always been met by this property.

text.text:
I went with my wife on her birthday to have candle light dinner by poolside, the cost for two was 4999 and we were informed about the entire setup like the table will be located near the pool there will be minimal decoration with some balloons roses and candles also a water cooler will be provided to keep temp under control, in case of rain the dinner setup will be moved to the cafeteria, below is review of our experience.

Overall setup and ambience - the view from the table was good but it was hot and humid despite the water cooler though we were not expecting AC like experience but it wasn't very comfortable, the decorations was kind gaudy though young couples may like it, but the worst part was privacy, hotel guests hotel staff were kept on walking by the table and some guests kept on staring at us as if we are jail convicts... So if you are going for privacy and good ambience this isn't the place/setup.

Service - service provided was good the fellow who served us I.e. Adarsh tried his best to keep us comfortable and provided us couple of things which were not part of the menu.

Food - chaat, golgappa, were good, so was the paneer tikka though dahi kebab weren't great, coming to main course all the Indian breads were good though the daal tadka could have been better, lastly the sweet dish I.e. Gulab jamun and rasmalai were below average in terms of taste and perhaps the only saving grace was the vanilla ice cream.

Bottomline - it's not worth the price and hassle and ecxcept for the staff who were very courteous there are so many things which need to be worked upon before it could be considered as something worth spending

text.text:
Ah, The Umrao—a four-star hotel experience with all the charm of a suspicious neighborhood guesthouse.

I stayed here with my brother and had an early morning flight, while he was heading back to the hotel afterward to get ready for work (since he lives in Delhi). We informed the receptionist very clearly that he wasn’t checking out. But apparently, “communication” is just decorative at this hotel.

While waiting for the valet, the receptionist decided to bless us with his presence—five times—to ask us to pay for a chocolate from the minibar. Yes, a chocolate. The room was fully paid for, mind you. But he looked at our bags and confidently concluded that we were sneaking away into the sunrise with unpaid chocolate bar. I tried to stay polite, because arguing over a chocolate at 6am isn’t exactly how I like to start my day, but honestly, if I couldn’t afford a snack from the minibar, I wouldn’t be staying at The Umrao. Wild concept, I know.

And just when we thought the morning couldn’t get any better, my brother’s car wouldn’t start. Turns out, the valet—clearly a seasoned professional of “25 years”—forgot to switch off the headlights. When confronted, he assured us with full confidence that he would never do something so silly. Thankfully, the CCTV footage didn’t get the memo—because it clearly showed the lights were on all night. Oops. Eventually, my brother and the valet had to push the car while I sat in the driver’s seat to jumpstart it. Just the kind of five-star valet service you dream about.

To their credit, one of the managers at checkout did try to smooth things over and was genuinely polite and professional. It’s just a shame that the rest of the experience made it feel like we were on some sort of hidden camera show.

Would I stay again? Probably not. Unless I’m in the mood to be accused of chocolate theft and stranded by valet expertise.

Would definitely recommend in terms of value for money.

I had the pleasure of staying at Crowne Plaza New Delhi while attending the prestigious Award Ceremony organized by Brandman India, and I must say—it was an absolutely wonderful experience.

The hotel staff were outstanding—from the warm welcome at check-in to the attentive housekeeping and restaurant teams, everyone was courteous, professional, and genuinely caring. They went above and beyond to make sure guests were comfortable and well looked after.

The award event itself was perfectly managed, with elegant décor, smooth coordination, and excellent hospitality. It was truly a proud and memorable moment to receive recognition in such a classy venue.

A special mention must go to the breakfast buffet—a delightful spread with a variety of Indian and international dishes, all fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. The service during breakfast was prompt and friendly, making the start of each day feel special.

Thank you, Crowne Plaza, for making my stay so smooth and memorable. Highly recommended for both events and leisure stays.
Nizam Muhuseen

text.text:
A Great Stay – Friendly Staff & Comfortable Experience

From the moment we arrived, the staff were great—very friendly and helpful. On entry, there's a security process with metal detectors and bag scanners, which I actually appreciated. It gave a sense of safety and reassurance, so no complaints there.

The hotel itself is lovely. The rooms are clean and comfortable with a great view. The location is perfect—within walking distance to everything, and it's directly connected to a shopping centre, which was really convenient.

The swimming pool was a highlight: warm, clean, and well-maintained.

If I had to make one small criticism, it would be about the buffet in the evening. While I understand we’re in India and local flavours are expected, I would’ve liked a bit more variety and perhaps some milder, cooler options considering it’s part of an international hotel chain. But I managed and still enjoyed the meals overall.

In short: great hotel, fantastic staff, and I would definitely stay here again.

text.text:
The hotel enjoys a prime location with easy access to nearby offices and a direct entry to the adjoining mall—definitely a plus for business travelers and shoppers alike. The staff is courteous and the service is prompt, which adds a pleasant touch to the overall experience.

However, the rooms fall short of expectations considering the price point. Many fixtures and furnishings appear dated, and some amenities show signs of wear and tear. The washroom fittings, especially the taps and shower system, are quite old and could benefit from modernization. Notably, the absence of a hand shower makes it inconvenient for guests who prefer a quick refresh without using the overhead shower.

In summary, while the hospitality and location are commendable, the room interiors and bathroom facilities need significant upgrades to match the tariff and enhance guest comfort.

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at Novotel Aerocity, and it truly exceeded expectations. The location is incredibly convenient—just minutes from the airport—making it ideal for both business and leisure travelers.

🛏️ Rooms
The rooms are spacious, thoughtfully designed, and impeccably clean. The blend of comfort and modern aesthetics creates a relaxing environment that’s perfect to unwind after a long day.

🍽️ Dining
The in-house restaurants offer a delightful mix of Indian and international cuisines. The breakfast buffet deserves a special mention for its variety and freshness—great way to start the day!

💼 Service & Amenities
The staff is courteous, well-trained, and always ready to help. Whether it was housekeeping, front desk, or room service, everything ran like clockwork. The fitness center, pool, and spa add to the hotel’s appeal, offering guests a full wellness experience.

🎯 Overall Experience
It’s a polished, welcoming space with just the right dose of luxury. I’d happily recommend Novotel Aerocity for anyone looking for a quality stay close to the airport.

Overall, this hotel combines old-world elegance with modern comfort, making it a perfect choice . I would highly recommend it and look forward to returning on my next trip.

text.text:
Had a fantastic stay at Park Plaza Shahdara!
The rooms are clean, the ambience is great, and the staff is extremely helpful and courteous. One of the standout members was Rajkumar from housekeeping - very sincere and dedicated to his work. He ensured the linen was changed daily and maintained the overall cleanliness of the room to perfection. His attention to detail is truly commendable.

I was also impressed when I pointed out a scratch on the toilet seat — the team explained it wasn’t dirt, but still replaced the seat with a new one within 10 minutes without hesitation. On another day, I had to leave early and requested a sandwich before breakfast hours. To my surprise, they packed not just a sandwich, but also fruits, juice, muffins, and cupcakes — all ready by 6:45 AM!

The service and hospitality were exceptional throughout. Highly recommend this hotel for a comfortable, professional, and warm stay in Delhi!

text.text:
Average Experience at The Ashok Hotel, New Delhi

The location of The Ashok Hotel, New Delhi is undoubtedly brilliant, offering a grand view and a central position that is convenient for business and leisure travelers alike.

However, the rooms are quite old and lack modern amenities or updated technologies. The television does not support streaming applications, which is disappointing for a hotel of this stature. The washroom conditions are only average, and overall the property seems to be in need of refurbishment.

The service quality was average, with staff support not meeting expectations of a five-star property. The buffet food was also average, lacking variety and the finesse one would expect.

Overall, while the location and history of the hotel stand out, the rooms, service, and food quality need significant improvement to match modern hospitality standards.

Derisory hotel that is not up to a 4-star as indicated on the site.

Already, the hotel is located in a very dilapidated area, with only small streets all around, but with many small shops so rather positive on this point.

You should know that this hotel does not accept the international card, payment only in cash for foreigners who do not have a indian card. And obviously this detail was not indicated. It is important to specify it knowing that it is located in an airport area of the capital of India, so a lot of tourists.

The room, a disaster. Far from a 4 stars and its standing, even for India. Already the connected lock with card entry, does not work, so they installed a push button lock (which is half broken). Also, the walls are in poor condition (see photos)

Then the room is very old, half torn curtain, stained cushions, dirty floor.

Very old bathroom, with moldy shower head. Nothing positive. For me it is not a real 4 star compared to other 4 stars (cheaper) that I have frequented and that looked like a high-end palace with beautiful rooms.

The place is not soundproofed at all, we hear every movement, and especially people honk and move at dawn.

editorialSummary.text: Sleek quarters in a contemporary hotel offering a chic restaurant & a hip bar, plus an outdoor pool.

text.text:
I stayed at Aloft Aerocity for a one-day layover to relax after a 15-hour flight from the US to Delhi, and it was exactly what I needed. The hospitality was truly wonderful — the staff were friendly, respectful, and made me feel very welcome. The hotel was exceptionally clean and well-maintained, and my room was spacious, modern, and equipped with all the essentials for a comfortable stay. The bed was incredibly cozy and gave me the restful sleep I needed after the long journey. I especially enjoyed the breakfast spread — a great variety of fresh and flavorful vegetarian and non-veg options. The location is also perfect, just minutes from the airport, making it super convenient for travelers. Overall, it was a smooth and relaxing experience. Highly recommended for anyone looking to unwind during a transit or layover.

Kudos to entire staff who is maintaining Marriott brand value above and beyond expectations!

text.text:
Absolutely unacceptable experience – safety hazard, negligence, and disgraceful handling

We traveled all the way from London and were looking forward to a peaceful, comfortable stay at Aloft New Delhi—but what we experienced was nothing short of a nightmare.

A poorly secured cabinet in our room collapsed onto my foot, causing significant pain and swelling. The fact that such a serious safety hazard exists in a Marriott-branded property is shocking—but what followed was even more appalling.

We immediately contacted the hotel’s emergency line, expecting at least basic support. No one showed up. No first aid. No check-in. Not even a phone call. There was zero concern until we raised the issue again the next morning.

When I personally addressed this with the hotel manager, I was met with rudeness, apathy, and complete dismissal. He casually said, “these things happen,” and told me to just check out. No apology. No concern for my wellbeing. No accountability. Just indifference.

To make matters worse, the hotel’s idea of “resolution” was to refund 25% of the room charge—as if that makes up for the pain, the distress, and the humiliation of being treated like an inconvenience. It was insulting.

This wasn’t just poor service—it was gross negligence and deeply unprofessional conduct. Safety in a hotel room is non-negotiable. The complete lack of empathy and urgency shown by the staff reflects extremely poorly on Marriott’s standards.

We came all the way from another country and were treated with complete disregard during a painful and frightening incident.

I urge Marriott International to take this seriously and investigate this matter immediately. This is not how a global hospitality brand should operate. Until action is taken, I would strongly advise travelers—especially international guests—to stay elsewhere.

Location:
The hotel is conveniently located just a short drive from the airport, making it perfect for travelers. Despite its proximity to the airport, the soundproofing in the rooms is impressive, allowing for a peaceful night’s sleep.

Ambiance and Decor:
Upon entering, you’re greeted by a stunning lobby adorned with elegant decor and a welcoming atmosphere. The blend of modern and traditional Indian elements creates a warm and inviting space that sets the tone for the stay.

Room Quality:
My room was spacious and well-appointed, featuring comfortable bedding, a sleek bathroom, and all the amenities you could need, including a coffee maker and a mini-bar. The attention to detail was noticeable, from the quality toiletries to the plush furnishings.

Dining:
The dining options were superb. I enjoyed a delicious breakfast buffet with a wide range of choices, from local dishes to international favorites. The on-site restaurant also offers a fantastic dinner menu, showcasing the rich flavors of Indian cuisine.

Service:
The staff were incredibly friendly and attentive. From the check-in process to room service, everyone went above and beyond to ensure a comfortable stay. Their professionalism and willingness to assist were truly commendable.

Amenities:
The hotel features excellent amenities, including a well-equipped gym, a beautiful spa, and a lovely outdoor pool. These facilities added a relaxing touch to my stay, making it easy to unwind after a long day of travel.

Overall Experience:
I highly recommend the Radisson Blu Plaza Delhi Airport for both short and extended stays. Whether you’re traveling for business or leisure, this hotel provides a blend of luxury, comfort, and convenience that is hard to beat. I will definitely choose this hotel again for my future visits to Delhi.

text.text:
Radisson Blu Plaza Hotel, Delhi Airport is not just a hotel; it is a sanctuary of luxury, comfort, and impeccable service. From the moment I stepped into the lobby, I was greeted with the warmth and hospitality that India is famous for—truly living up to the saying, “Atithi Devo Bhava” (The guest is God).

Rooms – A Haven of Elegance

The rooms are meticulously designed with a blend of modern aesthetics and traditional Indian charm. The plush bedding, soft lighting, and high-end amenities create an ambiance that soothes both the body and the soul. Every night felt like sleeping on a cloud, and every morning began with a refreshing sense of tranquility.

Service – Hospitality at its Finest

The staff at Radisson Blu Plaza is a testament to the highest standards of service. Whether it was room service, housekeeping, or concierge, every interaction was infused with professionalism and a genuine willingness to assist. It reminded me of the Indian saying, “Seva Parmo Dharma” (Service is the highest duty).

Location – The Perfect Balance

Situated just minutes from Indira Gandhi International Airport, the hotel offers both convenience and accessibility. Despite its proximity to the airport, the interiors remain peaceful, ensuring that guests enjoy a serene retreat amidst the bustling energy of Delhi.

Dining – A Culinary Symphony

The dining experience at Radisson Blu Plaza is nothing short of exceptional. The variety of cuisines, the quality of ingredients, and the exquisite presentation of dishes create a gastronomic journey worth savoring. The Mughlai dishes were particularly outstanding—flavors so rich and authentic that they felt like a tribute to India’s royal heritage.

Overall Verdict

In the words of an old Indian proverb, “Swarg se sundar jagah wahi hai jaha man sukoon paye” (The most beautiful place is where the heart finds peace). Radisson Blu Plaza Hotel is exactly that—a sanctuary where every detail is crafted to perfection. Whether you are on a business trip or a leisurely escape, this hotel ensures an experience that is nothing short of extraordinary.

Thanks payal and Rupak for their assistance

text.text:
Over the course of multiple visits to Holiday Inn Mayur Vihar, I have had the pleasure of experiencing their exceptional hospitality, and I am delighted to share my thoughts on their outstanding offerings.

The first aspect that stands out during each visit is their delectable food. The culinary team at Holiday Inn Mayur Vihar deserves high praise for their diverse and delicious menu options. Whether it's breakfast, lunch, or dinner, each meal has been a delightful culinary journey. The quality of ingredients, presentation, and the perfect balance of flavors in their dishes consistently impresses me.

The ambience at Holiday Inn Mayur Vihar is another factor that elevates the entire experience. The tastefully designed interiors, complemented by soothing lighting and comfortable seating, create a welcoming and relaxing atmosphere. The attention to detail in the décor and the overall aesthetics of the hotel is commendable, making it an ideal place to unwind after a busy day.

The rooms at Holiday Inn Mayur Vihar are an epitome of comfort and luxury. Each time I have stayed, I have been impressed by the cleanliness, spaciousness, and thoughtful amenities provided in the rooms. The cozy beds, well-appointed furnishings, and modern technology ensure a truly comfortable stay, making it feel like a home away from home.

One of the most impressive aspects of the hotel is the behavior of their staff. The entire team at Holiday Inn Mayur Vihar is incredibly attentive, courteous, and dedicated to ensuring the utmost satisfaction of their guests. From the front desk to the restaurant staff, and housekeeping to room service, every member of the team goes above and beyond to provide a memorable experience.

I must also mention the efficient and prompt service that the hotel offers. Throughout my visits, I have observed their commitment to delivering a seamless experience, whether it's attending to requests promptly or providing useful information about the city.

Moreover, Holiday Inn’s commitment to maintaining health and safety protocols is praiseworthy. Especially in these challenging times, their strict adherence to hygiene standards is reassuring and provides peace of mind to the guests.

In conclusion, my multiple visits to Holiday Inn have been nothing short of exceptional. Their exquisite food, inviting ambience, comfortable rooms, and the genuinely caring staff create an unforgettable experience for any guest. Whether it's for business or leisure, Holiday Inn Mayur Vihar stands out as an exemplary hotel that consistently exceeds expectations. I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone seeking an enriching and fulfilling stay in Delhi.

text.text:
Holiday Inn is a fantastic hotel that offers outstanding services and amenities to its guests. From the moment you step into the hotel, you are greeted by a warm and welcoming atmosphere that sets the tone for an excellent stay. The staff is incredibly friendly, courteous, and helpful, making sure that every guest feels comfortable and taken care of.

One of the standout employees at the hotel is Ms. Deepika Joshi, who is a star performer. Her dedication to her job is evident in the way she goes above and beyond to ensure that guests have a memorable experience. Ms. Mahima Kapoor, Mr. Amanpreet Sandhu, and Mr. Ravi are also outstanding staff members who provide excellent service and are always willing to help.

The front desk staff at the hotel, including Rohit, Ginni, Srikant, Gaurav, Gunmeet, and Shalinder, are all very friendly and professional. They make checking in and out a breeze, and they are always available to answer any questions or address any concerns guests may have. Their efficiency and friendliness make the stay at the hotel even more enjoyable.

The food at the hotel is delicious, and there are plenty of options to choose from. Whether you're in the mood for something light or a more substantial meal, the hotel's restaurant has something for everyone. The room boy, Adil, is also excellent, making sure that the rooms are always clean and tidy.

In addition to its great staff and services, Holiday Inn is also an excellent venue for events. Recently, I had the pleasure of attending a 2-day event at the hotel, and I was impressed by how well-managed it was by the hotel staff.

From the planning stages to the execution of the event, the hotel staff was professional, organized, and attentive to every detail. They went out of their way to make sure that all aspects of the event, from the accommodations to the catering, were top-notch.

Throughout the event, the hotel staff was readily available to assist with any needs or concerns that arose, and they were always friendly and accommodating. They truly made the event a success, and I would highly recommend Holiday Inn as a venue for any event or conference.

Overall, my experience at Holiday Inn was fantastic, and I would definitely stay there again and recommend it to others. The staff's dedication to ensuring a comfortable and enjoyable stay, combined with the hotel's excellent amenities, made for a truly memorable experience.
Regards

text.text:
I do not have personal experiences or opinions. However, I can provide a general review of Holiday Inn New Delhi Mayur Vihar Noida, an IHG Hotel as per the reviews from various sources.

Holiday Inn New Delhi Mayur Vihar Noida, an IHG Hotel is a 5-star hotel located in the Mayur Vihar district of Delhi, India. The hotel offers 193 well-appointed guest rooms and suites that are luxurious, comfortable, and well-equipped with modern amenities such as flat-screen TV, minibar, safe and tea/coffee making facilities.

The hotel serves diverse cuisine right from Indian to International flavors at Café on 3, room service is available round the clock. The property features a fitness center, outdoor pool and spa center, which make sure guests are rejuvenated and relaxed at all times.

The hotel is well-located for business visitors with proximity to the business district of Noida and several metro stations. Many guests enjoyed the convenient location, accessibility, and proximity to the airport and other attractions. The staff is professional and friendly, and the hotel maintains high cleanliness standards, making it an ideal stay choice.

Overall, guests have highly recommended the hotel for its comfort, luxury amenities, location, and friendly services.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Park Inn by Radisson Hotel for a marriage event, and I must say, it was an excellent experience from start to finish.
The rooms were spacious, well-maintained, and provided a high level of comfort. The cleanliness and hygiene were impeccable, making the stay even more pleasant. The hotel offers extra beds upon request, which was quite helpful during our stay. It’s clear that the housekeeping team pays attention to every detail, ensuring guests feel at ease and comfortable.
The food served at the hotel was outstanding. Every meal was flavorful, well-prepared, and thoughtfully presented. Whether it was breakfast, lunch, or dinner, there was a great variety of options to choose from, and everything was delicious. The quality of the food matched the hotel’s reputation, and it certainly added to the overall positive experience.
What truly set the stay apart was the exceptional service provided by the hotel staff. They were not only professional but also kind and attentive, ensuring all our needs were met. They made us feel welcomed and were always ready to assist with a smile. Whether it was assisting with room arrangements or providing directions, their hospitality made a significant impact on our experience.
My stay at Park Inn by Radisson was a memorable one. From the clean and comfortable rooms to the delicious food and outstanding service, everything exceeded my expectations. The hotel provided a perfect environment for a wedding stay, and I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable, comfortable, and pleasant stay.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at The Suryaa New Delhi and it was truly an exceptional experience. From the moment I entered the hotel, I was impressed with the warm welcome and impeccable service.

The hotel's location in the heart of New Delhi is ideal, with easy access to many popular attractions and business districts. The lobby is grand and elegantly designed, setting the tone for a luxurious stay.

The rooms at The Suryaa are spacious, well-appointed, and tastefully decorated. The bed was comfortable and the room was equipped with all the modern amenities I needed for a comfortable stay, including a flat-screen TV, minibar, and Wi-Fi connectivity. Hyatt Centric Janakpuri, New Delhi, epitomizes luxury and sophistication, offering a remarkable experience for travelers seeking both comfort and convenience. From its elegant accommodations to its impeccable service, every aspect of this hotel is designed to exceed expectations.

Upon arrival, guests are greeted by the hotel's modern and chic lobby, which sets the tone for the rest of their stay. The seamless check-in process and attentive staff ensure a smooth transition, allowing guests to immediately feel at ease.

The rooms at Hyatt Centric Janakpuri are nothing short of exceptional. Spacious, well-appointed, and tastefully decorated, they provide a welcome retreat from the bustling city outside. Whether you're staying in one of the deluxe rooms or indulging in a suite, you'll find yourself surrounded by luxury and comfort at every turn.

But the allure of Hyatt Centric Janakpuri extends beyond its accommodations. The hotel boasts an array of amenities designed to enhance the guest experience, including a fully-equipped fitness center, a refreshing swimming pool, and a rejuvenating spa. Whether you're looking to stay active or simply unwind and relax, there's something for everyone to enjoy.

When it comes to dining, Hyatt Centric Janakpuri leaves no stone unturned. The hotel's restaurants and bars offer a diverse range of culinary delights, from authentic Indian cuisine to international favorites. Whether you're craving a hearty breakfast, a leisurely brunch, or a gourmet dinner, you'll find it all within the confines of this luxurious hotel.

Moreover, Hyatt Centric Janakpuri's prime location ensures easy access to some of the city's most iconic attractions and business hubs. Whether you're here for work or leisure, you'll find that everything you need is just a stone's throw away.

In conclusion, Hyatt Centric Janakpuri, New Delhi, is a true gem in the heart of the city. With its elegant accommodations, impeccable service, and abundance of amenities, it offers a truly unforgettable experience for discerning travelers. Whether you're here for a short stay or an extended vacation, you'll find that every moment spent at Hyatt Centric Janakpuri is nothing short of extraordinary.

text.text:
I recently stayed at the Metropolitan Hotel in New Delhi and had an exceptional experience. This 5-star property exceeded my expectations with its impeccable service, modern amenities, and prime location.

Room and Amenities
My deluxe room was tastefully decorated, spacious, and well-equipped with a comfortable bed, minibar, and high-speed internet. The bathroom was sleek and clean. The hotel's outdoor pool, fitness center, and spa offered welcome relaxation.

Dining
The Metropolitan's restaurants served exquisite cuisine. Sakura's Japanese dishes impressed, while Chutney's Indian delicacies delighted. The breakfast buffet at Zing offered diverse options.

Service
The staff's warmth, efficiency, and attention to detail made our stay memorable. From check-in to checkout, every interaction was seamless.

Location
Conveniently situated near Connaught Place, the hotel provided easy access to Delhi's key attractions.

Areas for Improvement
1. Room soundproofing could be enhanced.
2. Parking fees seemed steep.

Recommendation
The Metropolitan Hotel is ideal for business travelers and tourists seeking luxury, comfort, and convenience. With minor tweaks, it could achieve perfection.

text.text:
As a well-traveled Hilton Honors Gold Member, I can confidently say that the Hilton Garden Inn, Saket exceeded my expectations on every front. What makes this property truly special is not just the comfort of the rooms or the prime location—it’s the incredible staff who go above and beyond to create a personalized and caring experience.

During a challenging time—while managing a hospital visit for my mother—the entire team made my stay remarkably smooth and comforting. Bhavay and Kunal at the Front Desk stood out with their professionalism, empathy, and genuine care. They were attentive to every detail and ensured that I had everything I needed to focus on what truly mattered.

Gaurav at the Bar brought warmth and hospitality every evening with his thoughtful service and excellent recommendations. The breakfast staff made each morning pleasant with a cheerful attitude and delicious food options that lifted my spirits. A special thank you to Bintu from Housekeeping, who ensured my room was always immaculate and comforting after long days at the hospital.

This wasn’t just a hotel stay—it felt like a second home during a difficult time. I can’t thank the team enough for their kindness and professionalism. I highly recommend Novotel Aerocity Delhi to anyone visiting Delhi, whether for business or leisure.

Ambassador, New Delhi - IHCL SeleQtions is a luxurious hotel that I would highly recommend to anyone looking for a comfortable and memorable stay in the heart of the city. My recent stay at this hotel was truly outstanding and exceeded all my expectations.

The hotel's location is perfect, situated in the upscale Lutyens' Delhi area, surrounded by lush greenery and heritage monuments. It's conveniently located within walking distance of many popular tourist destinations, such as India Gate and Rashtrapati Bhavan. The hotel also offers easy access to the city's major business and shopping districts.

The hotel staff was exceptionally warm and welcoming, making me feel at home from the moment I arrived. They were attentive to my every need, and their excellent service continued throughout my stay. The hotel's room was beautifully designed, spacious, and had all the modern amenities one could ask for. The Ashok Hotel in Chanakyapuri, Delhi, is a well-known luxury hotel that blends classic charm with modern amenities. Here are some highlights from a typical review:
Ambiance and Decor: The Ashok Hotel exudes a regal ambiance with its elegant decor and spacious interiors. The design reflects a blend of traditional Indian and contemporary styles, providing a luxurious and comfortable environment.
Rooms: The rooms are spacious and well-appointed, featuring comfortable beds, modern bathrooms, and all the necessary amenities such as Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs, and minibars. Many guests appreciate the cleanliness and attention to detail in room service.
Dining: The hotel offers a variety of dining options, including multiple restaurants serving diverse cuisines ranging from Indian to international. The quality of food and service is generally praised, with many guests enjoying the fine dining experience.
Service: The staff at The Ashok are often commended for their professionalism and hospitality. Guests frequently mention the courteous and helpful nature of the employees, which enhances the overall experience.
Facilities: The hotel boasts extensive facilities, including a swimming pool, fitness center, spa, and business center. These amenities cater to both leisure and business travelers, making their stay more convenient and enjoyable.
Location: Situated in the diplomatic enclave of Chanakyapuri, The Ashok enjoys a prime location. It is close to major tourist attractions, government offices, and embassies, making it a convenient choice for travelers.
Events and Conferences: The hotel is renowned for hosting large events, conferences, and weddings. Its extensive banquet halls and conference facilities are well-equipped to handle various types of gatherings, with many guests appreciating the organizational capabilities of the hotel staff.
Overall, The Ashok Hotel in Chanakyapuri, Delhi, is often praised for its luxurious ambiance, excellent service, and convenient location. It remains a preferred choice for both domestic and international travelers seeking a premium stay in the heart of Delhi.

text.text:
Amazing Stay and Exceptional Service at Aloft New Delhi Aerocity

We recently stayed at Aloft New Delhi Aerocity from October 27 to November 2, 2024, for six nights, and it was an absolutely delightful experience! The hotel itself is beautiful, with modern amenities and a welcoming ambiance, but what truly stood out was the exceptional service provided by the staff.

A special shoutout to Executive Chef Sanjay Mishra, who went above and beyond to make our stay memorable. During one of our conversations, I casually mentioned that I hadn’t eaten fresh water chestnuts in a very long time. To my surprise, he not only remembered this but made the thoughtful effort to have them delivered to our room. This level of attentiveness and care is rare and deeply appreciated.

The entire staff was helpful, warm, and accommodating throughout our stay. Their dedication to ensuring a comfortable and enjoyable experience did not go unnoticed.

We highly recommend Aloft New Delhi Aerocity to anyone looking for a great stay in Delhi. We are already looking forward to our next visit in just a few days!

Thank you to everyone at Aloft for making our stay so memorable.

text.text:
Overall, my stay was marked by exceptional customer service and a delightful breakfast spread, but there were a few amenities that were absent.

Let's start with the positives. The comfort of the bed was truly commendable, ensuring a restful sleep. The breakfast menu, featuring a delectable array of North Indian, South Indian, and continental dishes, was an absolute treat for the taste buds. The variety and quality of the offerings, set a positive tone for the rest of the day.

However, what truly set this hotel apart was the exceptional customer service provided by the staff. Telephone calls were promptly and courteously attended by the front desk before my check-in. The airport pickup that they organized was spot-on.

On arrival, a special mention goes to Twinkle from security, who greeted me with warmth and enthusiasm at the main entrance. Twinkle took the time to give me a brief overview of the hotel's services and facilities, and she even went the extra mile by suggesting local attractions I could visit during my stay. She recommended using the hotel's cab service, which turned out to be a convenient and hassle-free way to explore the city. Ankit from the front office concierge proved to be extremely efficient in organizing a day trip for me in New Delhi. His attention to detail and willingness to ensure I had a fantastic experience made a positive impact on my trip.

During check-out, Yogitha at the front desk was exceptional and continued the streak of outstanding service. She requested and checked the details and comfort of my stay. She offered to take a picture of us and bid us farewell with a warm smile, leaving me with a lasting positive impression.

However, while the service was exceptional, there were a couple of aspects that didn't quite meet the mark. While the room had all the essential amenities, there were some subtle touches and finishes that were lacking, impacting the overall luxury experience. Additionally, the wellness area left a bit to be desired. I was surprised to find that there was no sauna or steam room available, which I had been looking forward to.

Despite these minor setbacks, I appreciate the efforts of the staff in making my stay memorable and enjoyable. With some enhancements to the room quality and wellness amenities, this hotel could easily reach the full five-star experience that its exceptional service deserves. I look forward to seeing how this establishment evolves in the future and hope to return for another visit.

text.text: I had a pleasant stay at this hotel located conveniently on the main road. It's just a short walk from the nearest metro station, making it a great choice for travelers. The rooms were clean and well-maintained, exceeding my expectations for the price. However, the breakfast offered didn't justify the cost, around ₹350. I'd recommend exploring other options nearby unless you prefer dining in. One minor drawback was the absence of dental and shaving kits in the rooms. Perhaps these could be provided by default. Overall, a good value for the money.
